programlist.title: WM test
programlist.origin: - Nintendo Developer Portal (Nitro, TWL, and CTR SDKs)

categories.title: Other console BOARD tests
categories.desc: Nitro/TWL EVA tests meant to test the hardware of other consoles, like the 3DS and Wii.

categories.title: Other TwlIPL tests
categories.desc: A collection of tests used in the development of the DSi. Many of these are internal equivalents to TWL EVA's tests, used in repair facilities or bundled with prototypes.

categories_broad.title: DSi firmware debugging
categories_broad.desc: Internal versions of DSi system apps, as well as related test tools.

categories_broad.title: DS factory tools
categories_broad.desc: Programs used in factories to test the hardware of the DS phat and DS lite.

categories_broad.title: DSi factory tools
categories_broad.desc: Programs used in factories to test DSi hardware and setup firmware.

categories_broad.title: Other factory apps
categories_broad.desc: DS/DSi software made to interface with the hardware of other consoles, like the 3DS and Wii.

categories_broad.title: TwlIPL tests
categories_broad.desc: Debug and test software used in the development of the DSi, and in internal repair facilities.

categories_broad.title: SDK test apps
categories_broad.desc: Tools from the Nintendo Developer Portal that were used to debug SDKs, libraries, and manage installed software.

categories_todo.title: Miscellaneous programs
categories_todo.desc: Programs that are waiting to be sorted, or which have no suitable category.
